coreAttributes.clothingAuthorTag: Printed on the inside, a small tag reads 'MFD by DSG Costume Supply Co, Ltd'.
coreAttributes.name: kitty bra
coreAttributes.description: A crop-top style bra with tie-up spaghetti straps and a cutout in the shape of a stylized cat.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(slip)] the bra over [npc.her] head and down onto [npc.her] torso before tying up the shoulder straps over each of [npc.her] shoulders.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(slip)] the bra over [npc2.namePos] head and down onto [npc2.her] torso before tying up the shoulder straps over each of [npc2.her] shoulders.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(shove)] the bra over [npc2.namePos] head and down onto [npc.her] torso before hastily tying up the shoulder straps over each of [npc2.her] shoulders.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(untie)] the shoulder straps on [npc.her] bra before pulling it up over [npc.her] head.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(untie)] the shoulder straps on [npc2.namePos] bra before pulling it up over [npc2.her] head.

replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(yank)] [npc2.namePos] bra back down, covering [npc2.her] torso.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] [npc.her] bra up to just below [npc.her] chin, fully exposing [npc.her] torso.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] [npc2.namePos] bra up to just below [npc2.her] chin, fully exposing [npc2.her] torso.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(pull)] [npc2.namePos] bra to just below [npc2.her] chin, fully exposing [npc2.her] torso.
